title: r/Relationships My Husband Cheated On Me... WITH HIS COUSIN!
description:
r/Relationships_Advice In today's episode, OP is a woman who's been married to her loving husband for years. Her husband's female cousin dies in a car accident, and that's when her husband drops an absolute bomb shell on her: he's been having an affair with his cousin throughout their entire marriage! OP thinks that her marriage maybe be over, but she isn't sure what to do. If you like this content, follow for more daily Reddit episodes!
